ethereal_spire.name: Ethereal Spire
ethereal_spire.description: A mystical tower suspended between worlds, where the fabric of reality is thin and magic flows freely.

astral_plane.name: Astral Plane
astral_plane.description: A dimension of pure magical energy where matter and spirit intertwine. Reality seems to shift at every turn.

mana_vortex.name: Mana Vortex
mana_vortex.description: A swirling tempest of raw magical energy. Spells misfire, reality bends, and mana crystallizes in strange formations.

void_nexus.name: Void Nexus
void_nexus.description: A convergence point between existence and non-existence. Ancient entities drift through the void, watching.

celestial_observatory.name: Celestial Observatory
celestial_observatory.description: An ancient structure floating among the stars where astronomers once channeled cosmic magic.

arcane_rift.name: Arcane Rift
arcane_rift.description: A tear in the fabric of magic itself. Spellcraft runs wild here, creating unpredictable phenomena.
